text: On 27 June 2022, a toxic gas leak happened at the Port of Aqaba in Aqaba, Jordan. A container carrying 25 tons of chlorine fell from a crane onto a docked ship and leaked. The incident killed at least fourteen people and injured more than 265. ==References== Category:2022 disasters in Asia Category:History of Jordan Category:June 2022 events
title: 2022 Aqaba toxic gas leak
